ruleContent.content:
<js>
let mid = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
let param = `api?type=url&mid=${mid}`;

let result = java.get("https://suapi.net/tool/"+java.webView(null,"https://suapi.net/tool/music",`sign_url("${param}&token="+document.getElementById("music-so").getAttribute("token"))`) , {});

let url = result.header("Location");
java.log(url )
url
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let arr = [];
try {
 let obj = JSON.parse(java.hexDecodeToString(result));
 arr.push({
  title: obj.title,
  url: `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(obj.mid)},{"type":"text"}`
 })
} catch (error) {
 java.log(error)
}
arr
</js>
